channel.title: Arm on Azure 4 Everyone
channel.description: Adam Marczak blog created for purpose of personal contribution and sharing knowledge to communities everywhere.

item.title: ARM Templates Orchestration
item.description: If you need to deploy multiple services and combine them together using ARM templates, then this episode is for you. This time we are going to look at orchestration using dependencies and references.

item.title: ARM Templates Parameter Files
item.description: With JSON-based Parameter Files you can supply environment variables consistently and conviniently to your ARM Templates.

item.title: ARM Templates Parametrization
item.description: Expressions, parameters and variables allow anyone to build flexible and reusable ARM templates. They are indeed a powerful tool in hands of skillful developers and administrators.

item.title: ARM Templates Introduction
item.description: Azure Resource Manager Templates provide simple and unified way to create and manage your Azure environments for both developers and administrators. With simple JSON files you can deploy your environment in consistent fashion and at great speed.
